Package model.portfolio

Class PortfolioImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.portfolio.PortfolioImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPortfolio
    public class PortfolioImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPortfolio
    The implementation of the IPortfolio interface. Represents a portfolio with a title and a list of stocks in this portfolio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new PortfolioImpl object with a title.

      Returns the title of the portfolio, and is used for formatting, and equivalency checks.

      A method to get the current info in the portfolio.
